summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account for the period of July 1, 2018, to July 31, 2018. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and ending balances, as well as instructions for addressing errors in the account statements.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact person for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $203,108.51 on July 1, 2018.
The ending balance as of July 31, 2018, was $173,463.61.
Multiple preauthorized debits were made during the month, including payroll and tax payments.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees reported for this statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors related to electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
